General.Name: T1 Energy Inc.
General.Description: T1 Energy Inc. provides energy solutions for solar and batteries in the United States and Norway. It also manufactures and sells photovoltaic solar modules. The company was formerly known as FREYR Battery, Inc. and changed its name to T1 Energy Inc. in February 2025. T1 Energy Inc. is headquartered in Austin, Texas.
General.Address: 1211 E 4th St., Austin, TX, United States, 78702

7.Name: Ms. Denise  Cruz
7.Title: SVP, Chief Accounting Officer & Corporate Controller
